text:
Introduced electric Ford Mustang ... on the mechanics
06 Nov 2019, 09:00 by Artyom Bausov
At the SEMA tuning show, they showed the electric version of the Ford Mustang.
The prototype of the brand new Ford Mustang Lithium EV Concept was assembled together with Webasto. The electric car received two Phi-Power engines with two power inverters producing 912 hp. and 1356 Nm.
The main feature of the car was a six-speed manual gearbox, an improved version of Getrag MT82. But there is no more information about her now.





Lowered suspension, differential Super 8.8 Torsen with axles Ford Performance



[The Verge]

You can switch between the four control modes using the 10.4-inch touch screen infotainment system. The 800-volt battery system is responsible for the power.
